original_text: But if the Lord creates something new, and the ground opens its mouth and swallows them up with all that belongs to them, and they go down alive into Sheol, then you shall know that these men have despised the Lord.”
korean_text: 만일 여호와께서 새 일을 행하사 땅이 입을 열어 이 사람들과 그들의 모든 소유물을 삼켜 산 채로 스올에 빠지게 하시면 이 사람들이 과연 여호와를 멸시한 것인 줄을 너희가 알리라

sentences.original_text: But if the Lord creates something new,
and the ground opens its mouth
and swallows them up with all that belongs to them,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들과 그들에게 속한 모든 것을 삼키고,

sentences.original_text: and they go down alive into Sheol,
that these men have despised the Lord.”
